iisph.description: Module used to implement an Implicit Incompressible SPH (IISPH) Solver modified from the original IISPH paper.
iisph.name: IISPH

iisphSum.description: Contains the sum element of the pressure forces (sum_j d_ij p_j).

iisphDii.description: Contains the diagional elements of the pressure force d_ii

iisphAiiOld.description: Contains the diagonal elements of the incompressibility matrix.

omega.description: Corrective term used to adjust the solver for changing support radii.

alpha.description: Temporary value used to improve the performance.

gamma.description: Temporary value used to improve the performance.

sigma.description: Temporary value used to improve the performance.

iisphDensityAdvection.description: Estimated density of a particle after it has been influenced by advection forces.

iisphDensityIteration.description: Density of a particle in the current iteration of the incompressibility solver.

kernelBuffer.description: Temporary value used to improve the performance.

velocityAdvection.description: Velocity of a particle including influence of advection forces.

density_error.name: Contains the average density error of the last solve step in percent.

iterations.name: Contains the number of iterations for the IISPH solver.

eta.name: Maximum average density error allowed for the incompressibility solver in percent. Useful value: 0.01f.

jacobi_omega.name: Relaxation factor for the relaxed jacobi solvler. Useful value: 0.5f.
